reviews.review:
[h1] EL SUMMUN DE LOS VIDEOJUEGOS [/h1]

Alguien recuerda la ultima vez que se quedó con la cara desencajada con un giro argumental?; alguien recuerda la ultima vez que se le quedo la cara desencajada mas de una vez en una misma historia?; ALGUIEN RECUERDA PODER DECIR, ESTO ES PERFECTO EN TODOS SUS SENTIDOS?.

Asi es, Bioshock Infinite no decepciona a nadie, desde el minuto 0 estaréis embelesados con la historia tan potente que se explica en Infinite, de la taquicardia que os entrará en el fragor de la batalla  cuando estéis a punto de completar una sección y avanzar al nuevo capitulo de la historia, o del momento más epico de la historia cuando todo a tu alrededor no para de asombrarte y maravillarte y a pesar de eso tienes que concentrarte en disparar como un condenado.

Por si esto fuera poco tiene uno de los mejores Soundtrack que he oído, y la belleza visual supera a toda imaginación; Bioshock 1 maravillaba, pero no tiene nada que ver una ciudad flotante donde hasta el minimo detalle está cuidado, y poder contemplar más allá de un cristal, hasta el horizonte.

Si a día de hoy no tienes B. Infinite no se a que esperas, tenlo ya, porque marcará una generación.

10/10

Awesome game, great storyline & very nice graphics !
The story is sometimes really confusing, but I really like the game because of that ...
Briliant story, beautiful surroundings and smooth gameplay.

For the 2 days I have owned BioShock Infinite I have loved everything about it. The Graphics are mind-blowing, the gameplay is amazing and I would pay $50.00 for this game, but I took advantage of the sale. BioShock is exciting and makes you want to play more everytime you close out of the program. You could play the game for atleast 5 hours on end.
Game gets 10/10! Buy it ASAP
Was ne hammer Aufmachung
nice game

面白かったです
http://diary.jgs.me/post/68665087053/bioshock-infinite

Quelques heures après avoir démarré une session de BioShock Infinite, je comprends pourquoi toutes les critiques l'ont encensé début 2013. Je viens de profiter des Soldes Steam pour l'acquérir à moins de 8€. C'est effectivement un chef d'oeuvre de game design et l'environnement, tiré des influences Steampunk (aucun rapport avec Steam, excepté la vapeur !) et aux mondes de Miazaki dans Le chateau dans le Ciel, par ex., en fait un très beau jeau, doté d'une histoire complexe, avec une héroïne attachante, pleine de légèreté.
On notera aussi les concepts de religion où la dualité terre / ciel est très présente, avec tous les artifices de la croyance et de ses dogmes. Néanmoins, BI reste un FPS presque "coopératif" tant Elizabeth vous est d'une aide précieuse, et dont les combats sont très soignés graphiquement comme en action. Je ne puis que recommander, forcément.
Testé avec Core i5 / GTX 660 / W8.1 / 16GB de RAM. Tout en "ultra" :)

Après avoir joué maintes et maintes heures à Bioshock Infinite, il est temps de tirer les conclusions qui s'imposent : c'est MA-GNI-FIQUE. Certains pourraient s'attarder sur les textures parfois cracra mais le reste (et quel reste !) est absolument génial. Les toniques, les combinaisons d'attaques, updates et l'Histoire en font un jeu qui ne doit surtout pas être pris comme un simple jeu. L'histoire est telle que après l'avoir terminé, je me suis senti "vidé". 
BI est tout à fait le genre de jeu qui vous attache aux héros d'une manière que lorsque l'histoire se conclut, que ce soit dans BI ou dans Burial at Sea, Ep. 2, vous vous sentez mélancolique, de part les évènements passés mais par le manque qui vous dit "quand ré-endosserai-je ces rôles ?"
Celui d'Élizabeth est tout bonnement bluffant et la dualité Booker/Elizabeth est redoutable.
Je n'avais plus connu ça depuis HL² et ses épisodes !

En bref, du tout bon et je ne peux en dire plus sans spoiler l'Histoire avec un grand "H" !
Geile Welt.
Absolut geniale Story im Main sowie auch in den Addons !

UM PUTA DE UM JOGO! o cenário é 1000%,jogabilidade 1000%...

Even on low graphics, this game is still incredibble. The imagination and atmosphere sreated reflects this!

really nice surreal game!

Парящий в небесах город, что может быть красивее? Только только попав на Колумбию мы попадаем в о чарующие объятия этого прекрасного города. 20 года, своеобразный стимпанк, каждый уголок Колумбии пропитан этой атмосферой. Но не все так просто, вскоре игроку придется познать и темную сторону этого города.. 
  
  Биошок Инфинит поднимает совсем не детские темы, такие как -  угнетение прав, расизм, власть и свержение её. Показывает разные стороны веры и религии, и наконец разграничивает понятия о добре и зле!
 
  Игра в которой ты можешь побывать в центре города, а через несколько часов оказаться в трущобах, а после поднять революцию.. Повернуть время в спять! В прямом и переносном значение этого слова. 

   А после прохождения игры ты будешь еще сидеть и думать над финалом, вспоминая лучшие моменты. Проходить игру очень интересно, к тому же  проходишь ты не один, а с милашкой Элизабет :3

  Пожалуй одна из немногих игр, по мотивам которой можно смело написать книгу или снять фильм.  Захватывающий сюжет, прекрасные локации, и отличная озвучка: ради этого стоит пройти игру, и поверьте, она вам никогда не забудется!)

Um... WOW... im completely blown away by this absolutelty fine work of art. All i gotta say is GTX 460 ovclocked using MSI Afterburner can run this game at its highest graphics settings. DO NOT MISS THIS GAME.
Довольно необычная и оригинальная стилистика уровней. Остальное на уровне стандартных шутеров и серии Bioshock. Игровой процесс при этом нехило затягивает на продолжительное время.

Love this game. I hope they keeps adding more to the series. I have played Bioshock(pc) and BioshockII(ps3) and now Bioshock Infinite. I have it for the ps3 and PC it plays better on the ps3 but looks way better on the pc. This series gets a 10/10 and would get 15/10 but theres no co-op or multiplayer.
Не смотря на то что не являюсь поклоником шутеров вообще и серии Биошок в частности, я в восторге! Игра великолепна!)
yes!

Absolutely dull and bad game if look on it as a shooter. Graphics looks nice, cant say much about story, but gameplay is totally awful. Its not a shooter game at all, but its trying to look like it in trailers. It should be some 3D quest or turn based rpg game.

A masterfully crafted work of art in pretty much every way possible, there isn’t much more to say without spoiling a great experience.
Fantastic atmosphere, great visuals and gameplay mechanics. This is a must-own FPS!

There are games that are either good in the story but lack the graphics and games that shine in graphics but lack a good story. If we had a game that had great graphics and a really mind blowing story we would get this. I love the way the story build up to the end where all of the puzzle pieces are being finally put together. Loved the game!

Amazing story, beautiful, immersive set pieces, brilliant acting and amazing characters.  Twists and turns in the story allow for a second playthrough (something most games don't warrant).  Gunplay gets stale too quickly, and the game is short.  A must-play, but not worth the $60 (or even $40) price point.  Get it when it goes on sale!  9/10.

This is an awesome game.  Some might call it a "hallway shooter" or decry how the beautiful vistas of Columbia turn quickly into a dark and sinister vision of manifest destiny gone bad, but the game stays true to the story it tries very hard to tell.  About a man between realities doing his best to make sense of the task givin him.  Lots of action and wonderful graphics that are a fitting addition to the "Shock" family of games.  Beat it on hard mode, am now working through 1999.
Superb

Seriously. Good game, Good story, stayed up 11 hours playing through the campaign.
5/5 niggas

게임 디자이너 어니스트 아담스가 주장하는 스토리와 인터렉티브의 반비례관계를 깨뜨린 작품. 스토리 완성도와 인터렉티브의 균형점을 아주 잘 잡아내었다.

그러나 선형적인 진행방식과 각 퀘스트마다 제한된 맵을 오가며 플레이하는 과정에서 다시 늘어나있는 적들과 전투를 치루는 것은 플레이어에게 지루함을 준다.

엉망인 레벨디자인과 지루한 방식때문에 예술적인 스토리 몰입을 방해하는 대표적인 케이스.

3.5/5

Gorgeous game that went in an interesting direction compared to the first Bioshock. Elizabeth is probably the second best AI companion next to Alyx from HL2. I would highly recommend playing this game on hard difficulty for the best experience.

This is one amazing game. great storyline not super short like some games of this type (if you where to just play the storyline and not deveate at all it would take about maybe 15 hours). the graphics are great and the music is good (lots of gospel like music but even me not following that faith i diged the music) basicaly i would recomend this game even if your not a FPS person if you where to play it through on easy just for the story it would be worth the cost of this game alone.
Had it on the XBOX360, and now purchased on Steam. It's that great.
the best singleplayer game i've ever played
This is a great game. Has great meaning and gameplay. Highly recomended to anyone
Uma das melhores histórias da saga Bioshock. O jogo é muito bonito e bem desenvolvido, difícilmente você verá um bug durante o jogo. :)
This game...... Is the best most addicting game i have ever played so far. I cannot describe how ammazing this game is. BUY IT NOW

This review is going to be very short because I want to get back to playing it so much.  I have beaten the single player story and I am now moving on to the DLC.  This game is one of the best games I have ever played.  It was an amazing, immersive, and breathtaking journey through the city of Columbia.  Throughout your adventure through the sky you will encounter deep topics such as racism, religion, and multiple dimensions.  I don't want to spoil anything, but the ending to this game if you can understand it, is jaw dropping and emotional.  I would rate this title but I would look like a kiss-ass rating it a 10/10.  Anyways I strongly urge you to play the original Bioshock before you play this.  Though you certainly don't have to play the original BIoshock to understand Bioshock Infinite's story.  Please, please, play this.  It is most definitely one of my all time favorite games.
Incredibly addictive with impressive graphics.

BIOSHOCK
INFINITE

I highly recommend this game. Its beautiful to look at and has a great plot. This is one of my favorite games of all time and I seriously recommend getting this for an unforgettable gaming experience.
I love the game! It's like playing a movie It's not like any game I've ever played.

In contrast to the sunken Art Deco corridors of Rapture, Columbia is a breath of fresh air! Seriously, it's a city floating in the sky.

The combat is very satisfying, frantic, and visceral. I love the characters and the story, I could gush about this game for days so why don't you just play it?
Simply Amazing

Просто нет слов... Эта Игра - абсолютный шедевр. Абсолютно каждая деталь в ней идеальна. Одна из лучших Игр, в которые я вообще когда-либо играл, и уж точно Игра Года. Вы все еще читаете это? Не тратьте время, играйте в Bioshock Infinite! Просто запустите - и не сможете оторваться!

P.S. сейчас 5 часов утра 0_o

There are hundreds of thousands of words in the english vocabulary. This game takes one, Beautiful. I love this game, as hard as it is for me to call it my favorite, it takes the title hands down. Everything from the story-line, the gameplay, music, artistic style, its all flawless. I reccomend you get it no matter how much the cost because it will be worth every penny. If this doesn't win Game of the Year, I will be really upset. It deserves to win, and with 85 other awards, it honestly is a game for everyone.
Bestes Ende Ever
its ok 10/10

One of the worst sequels ever made. Everything is a step down from the original: Story, gameplay, setting. Everything.

Gameplay is Call of Duty tier: kill hordes of mundane enemies over and over completely lacking any thought or satisfaction in the deed.  Guns are terrible. Seriously, there is not one gun in the game I do not reflect back upon with utter distain. In the original Bioshock weapon and plasmid upgrades were bought through separate resource pools. But in this game, EVERYTHING, and I mean EVERYTHING, is bought through the same pool. This means you don't have any room to experiment with the "Vigor's" (which are just cut & pastes from the older game), and have to invest in solid shoot'em'up tactics because when you get right down to it, Vigor's are just something to call this game a "Shock" game and not a "Call of Dutes" game. You can only carry two guns at once, and there is easily 10+ shit tier guns polluting the gun pool with their ammo. Which means in certain engagements, your main upgraded guns will likely run out of ammo and you'll be forced to use terrible re-skins in their place. Shooting guns is sticky, slow, tedious and all around not fun.

Story takes a dive 1/4th into the game and from there on its a run and gun shoot'em up, all the way to the end with its exceptionally ill thought out ending (which doesn't resolve anything), but makes scrubs who don't want to feel stupid for not getting the ending shower it in praise for "depth", when in actuality it's simple, dull & poorly thought out. Ken Levine Scrapped the real Bioshock Infinite when he ran out of time wasting it on MP no one wanted, and was forced to put this shit out on the market. Literally, nothing promised in the original hype was delivered. Everything was recycled from the REAL Bioshock Infinite to create a presentable new game, and it certainly shows. Especially in character dialogue.

Setting is un-imaginative and in comparison with Rapture, Columbia doesn't hold any water (no pun intended). In Rapture, the city felt like a living enemy. The ocean and crumbling city always loomed with you, and you were always aware that you were in a tin-can with a sheet of flexi-glass between you and death. In Columbia, you can just jump off the side and insta respawn with no consequences Super Meat Boy style. Enemies lack explanation or purpose in the world of Columbia, (take the fireman & patriot) & those that do are incredibly un-original or just half-assed (crow racist people, Handy-Man).

If you buy this game, I have no sympathy for you. Enjoy your middle of the game shit tier boss battle with Ghost lady 3 times over, while trying to justify your purchase by telling people like me "it was 2deep4u".

Bioshock Infinite's ability to juggle several storylines at once makes it one hell of an emotional rollercoaster. You'll hear and see details in the game world that will throw all rational expectations out the window. Of course, by the time you reach the climaxes, you'll know to expect the opposite of what you'd think... or do you? Should you?

Elizabeth, the fearless Disney princess shows how to make a sidekick useful. She helps you get through the outdrawn combat periods by throwing you health kits and salt bottles, and gives you money she finds when you're walking about. Not that it matters though, since the huge waves of enemies will give you a hard challenge no matter how much you've invested in your guns. 

The chemical-induced superpowers, the characteristic of Bioshock, don't seem to play a big role in this game. Sure, they are shown front and center, but outside of the scripted events some of them are presented in, they're pretty much avoidable. I didn't even get all the different Salts because I didn't have to rely on them.

Despite all of these flaws, I had an incredible experience from just following the story, and I would recommend it to even those who haven't touched the first two games.
An absolutley AMAZING game! If you liked/loved the Fallout games you MUST buy!
The Perfect Game of the year. Then again, it's Bioshock. What do you expect?
This is the greatest piece of media and story telling I have ever experienced. PLAY IT!

I enjoyed the setting of the first bioshock, but the story didnt grip me enough to beat the game. Bioshock infinite managed to fix that, by having a much better story, and more importantly, an interesting npc character who follows you around adding to the story and game dialog as you play through. The action is pretty run and gun, and will have you dodging rockets, jumping onto sky rails, and using crazy magical like powers. The thing that will keep you playing however, is wanting to know what happens next in the story, and where they could possibly take the plot. Top notch voice acting and script!

This is the single best gaming experience that I have ever had... Don't beliee me? This is on the same level as Half Life 2, this game will define how games in the future will tell a story and how it emotionally impacts the player. While the gameplay itself might not be the best (it is not bad, just not very interested) it still does not matter as the story levels it all out with awesomeness. In terms of difficulty, this game on 1999 is actually not that hard, it just takes some tactics on how to use your vigors. One thing that brings this game down a bit, is the lady comstock fight on 1999.... some one dun goofed on that one... But after you complete that fight, everything else seems easy afterwards. Go. Buy. This. Game!
Absolutely incredible game. The setting is so interesting, and the story compleyely hooked me. Couldn't put it down until I finished.

My original playthrough of the game was the Xbox 360 version, enjoyed it, then I got the pc version the graphical improvement and superior controlls improved my experience greatly, I'd pick up this game while it's only 10 dollars.

I have played all three of the Bioshock games.  This game is as much fun as the two previous games.  I've already finished the DLC and am waiting for more.  It was very interesting to see the underwater city in the DLC before it was destroyed.  Keep the DLCs coming.
Grymt men känns som om det är gjort för kontroller.

Das Hauptspiel ist hammer <4,5 von 5 Sternen> aber bei dem Addon BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea - Episode 1 stimmt das Preis Leistungsverhältnis überhaupt nicht (keine Deutsche Sprachausgabe sehr kurze Spielzeit)

A very cool game story-wise, but also very linear, relatively short and feels like a console port. Took about 12 hours to finish it and that was really taking my time and exploring what I could. After I finished, I figured with the style of gameplay it really didn't NEED to be much longer than that. They told the story they wanted to tell, and it's a great ride. Besides, everything got repetitive after a while. It's EASILY worth a discounted price, but I'd have been upset had I bought this for $50.

sick game, I never really delved into single player games before dishonored and I must say this one doesnt dissapoint I just got it a played it for around 1/2 hours i could deffinitly see myself beat this game multiple times !
Just like the other Bios it puts you in a place that you have never seen amazing

A fantastic and immersive first person shooter. I've never had so much fun in a single player FPS before in years. The story is engaging, the characters have many dimensions, and the ending is a wicked twist. Highly recommended for fast-paced action players, this one never stops with the adrenaline rush.
Отличная игра!
Grafik: Geil! Story: GEIL! Charackter: GEIL! Aufjedenfall eine Kaufempfehlung; gerade noch im Angebot für 8 € , kaufen und bei meinen Lets Play zuschauen =DDD
Great game!

This game is truly epic and immersive. At times the gameplay was a little reppeditive, but what it lacked in gameplay was made up for in story. I highly reccomend this game to anyone who is into games with a strong narrative, and people who liked the original series.
Great game, the plot. THE PLOT. THIS PLOT. THAT PLOT.

the world design is amazing !
totally worth spending time playing it , 
even you  just wanna walk around and enjoy with the enviroment.

just......must buy.

10/10
Superb game! Excellent gameplay and a terrific story. Very immersive. Definately worth buying with or with out the steam sale :)

Super jeu, très prenant, l'ambiance est très sympa et les décors magnifiques avec des graphismes de bonne qualité.
Possibly the best game I've ever played and no doubt the best game of this year. Im impressed.

One of the most visually stunning games ever made.  Very solid game.  I wanted to takea  quick look at it with the idea of finishign some other games first.  I ended up playing it for several hours and forgot about my other games entirely.  75% off on the steam sale is an unbeatable deal.
